mapper.sql: ID, MER_NO, MER_NAME, MER_WITHOUT_PWD_SIGN, PAY_OPEN_FLAG, MER_BUSI_TYPE, CONTACT, CONTACT_TEL, CONTACT_MOBILE, CONTACT_EMAIL, MER_TEL, MER_FAX, MER_ADDR, MER_POSTAL_CODE, WEBSITE_CODE, WEBSITE_NAME, WEBSITE_DOMAIN, WEBSITE_SCOP, COMPANY_NAME, EGAL_PERSON_NAME, EGAL_PERSON_ID_TYPE, EGAL_PERSON_ID_NO, COMPANY_ID_TYPE, COMPANY_ID_NO, ORG_DEPT_NO, BUSI_LICENSE_ID, OPEN_DATE, MER_STATE, PARENT_MER_NO, USER_ID, SUB_MCH_ID, IS_ENTRUST, EXTENSION_PARTY, QR_CODE, QR_LIMIT_COUNT, QR_VALID_TIME, QR_ORDER_NO, ALIPAY_MERCHANT_ID, ALIPAY_MERUPDATE_PARAM, ALIAS_NAME, QR_MER, PROMOTER_NAME, PROMOTER_IPHONE, PROMOTER_DEPT_NO, PROMOTER_DEPT_NAME, QRCODE_USR_WECHAT, QRCODE_USR_ALIPAY
mapper.insert:
insert into
ID,
MER_NO,
MER_NAME,
MER_WITHOUT_PWD_SIGN,
PAY_OPEN_FLAG,
MER_BUSI_TYPE,
CONTACT,
CONTACT_TEL,
CONTACT_MOBILE,
CONTACT_EMAIL,
MER_TEL,
MER_FAX,
MER_ADDR,
MER_POSTAL_CODE,
WEBSITE_CODE,
WEBSITE_NAME,
WEBSITE_DOMAIN,
WEBSITE_SCOP,
COMPANY_NAME,
EGAL_PERSON_NAME,
EGAL_PERSON_ID_TYPE,
EGAL_PERSON_ID_NO,
COMPANY_ID_TYPE,
COMPANY_ID_NO,
ORG_DEPT_NO,
BUSI_LICENSE_ID,
OPEN_DATE,
MER_STATE,
PARENT_MER_NO,
USER_ID,
SUB_MCH_ID,
IS_ENTRUST,
EXTENSION_PARTY,
QR_CODE,
QR_LIMIT_COUNT,
QR_VALID_TIME,
QR_ORDER_NO,
ALIPAY_MERCHANT_ID,
ALIPAY_MERUPDATE_PARAM,
ALIAS_NAME,
QR_MER,
PROMOTER_NAME,
PROMOTER_IPHONE,
PROMOTER_DEPT_NO,
PROMOTER_DEPT_NAME,
QRCODE_USR_WECHAT,
QRCODE_USR_ALIPAY,
#{id},
#{merNo},
#{merName},
#{merWithoutPwdSign},
#{payOpenFlag},
#{merBusiType},
#{contact},
#{contactTel},
#{contactMobile},
#{contactEmail},
#{merTel},
#{merFax},
#{merAddr},
#{merPostalCode},
#{websiteCode},
#{websiteName},
#{websiteDomain},
#{websiteScop},
#{companyName},
#{egalPersonName},
#{egalPersonIdType},
#{egalPersonIdNo},
#{companyIdType},
#{companyIdNo},
#{orgDeptNo},
#{busiLicenseId},
#{openDate},
#{merState},
#{parentMerNo},
#{userId},
#{subMchId},
#{isEntrust},
#{extensionParty},
#{qrCode},
#{qrLimitCount},
#{qrValidTime},
#{qrOrderNo},
#{alipayMerchantId},
#{alipayMerupdateParam},
#{aliasName},
#{qrMer},
#{promoterName},
#{promoterIphone},
#{promoterDeptNo},
#{promoterDeptName},
#{qrcodeUsrWechat},
#{qrcodeUsrAlipay},
mapper.update:
update
ID=#{id},
MER_NO=#{merNo},
MER_NAME=#{merName},
MER_WITHOUT_PWD_SIGN=#{merWithoutPwdSign},
PAY_OPEN_FLAG=#{payOpenFlag},
MER_BUSI_TYPE=#{merBusiType},
CONTACT=#{contact},
CONTACT_TEL=#{contactTel},
CONTACT_MOBILE=#{contactMobile},
CONTACT_EMAIL=#{contactEmail},
MER_TEL=#{merTel},
MER_FAX=#{merFax},
MER_ADDR=#{merAddr},
MER_POSTAL_CODE=#{merPostalCode},
WEBSITE_CODE=#{websiteCode},
WEBSITE_NAME=#{websiteName},
WEBSITE_DOMAIN=#{websiteDomain},
WEBSITE_SCOP=#{websiteScop},
COMPANY_NAME=#{companyName},
EGAL_PERSON_NAME=#{egalPersonName},
EGAL_PERSON_ID_TYPE=#{egalPersonIdType},
EGAL_PERSON_ID_NO=#{egalPersonIdNo},
COMPANY_ID_TYPE=#{companyIdType},
COMPANY_ID_NO=#{companyIdNo},
ORG_DEPT_NO=#{orgDeptNo},
BUSI_LICENSE_ID=#{busiLicenseId},
OPEN_DATE=#{openDate},
MER_STATE=#{merState},
PARENT_MER_NO=#{parentMerNo},
USER_ID=#{userId},
SUB_MCH_ID=#{subMchId},
IS_ENTRUST=#{isEntrust},
EXTENSION_PARTY=#{extensionParty},
QR_CODE=#{qrCode},
QR_LIMIT_COUNT=#{qrLimitCount},
QR_VALID_TIME=#{qrValidTime},
QR_ORDER_NO=#{qrOrderNo},
ALIPAY_MERCHANT_ID=#{alipayMerchantId},
ALIPAY_MERUPDATE_PARAM=#{alipayMerupdateParam},
ALIAS_NAME=#{aliasName},
QR_MER=#{qrMer},
PROMOTER_NAME=#{promoterName},
PROMOTER_IPHONE=#{promoterIphone},
PROMOTER_DEPT_NO=#{promoterDeptNo},
PROMOTER_DEPT_NAME=#{promoterDeptName},
QRCODE_USR_WECHAT=#{qrcodeUsrWechat},
QRCODE_USR_ALIPAY=#{qrcodeUsrAlipay},
where ID=#{id}
